SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.student

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.student.StudentManager
public class StudentManager extends Object

Student User Data Manager

This class serves as the dedicated manager for all Student objects within the IPMS. It is responsible for initializing the data store, handling persistence (saving and loading), and providing methods for retrieving and filtering student accounts.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
